description.S1: You found the weapon that Ludwig had stashed in Edgewater.
description.S2: Return to him and learn how he intends to use it against the mechanical menace.

blurb.B2: return it to Ludwig to receive a Mag-2-Zap as a reward.
blurb.B3: Ludwig then asks the Stranger to retrieve an undamaged logic module in the geothermal power plant.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You mentioned a logic module. I found one in the geothermal plant.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: Bang-up work, soldier. You're a credit to your uniform. Oh, that reminds me. Gotta look into getting us a uniform.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: So this is it, then. The key to humanity's victory over the mechanical hordes.

dialog.speaker: LudwigMiller (Male)
dialog.utterance: I would reward you with the gratitude of the Resistance, but I'm guessing you want something tactile. So here's a couple bits for your trouble, and a little something to remember me by.
